thread.title: Hong Kong Airlines Gold Coast Cairns flights
thread.title_full: Hong Kong Airlines Gold Coast Cairns flights - Australian Business Traveller

author: David Flynn
title: Hong Kong Airlines Gold Coast Cairns flights
text:
IN BRIEF | Hong Kong Airlines is slated to launch direct flights between the Gold Coast and Hong Kong early next year, in what would be the first Australian route for the airline.
Although an official announcement is expected to be made today by Gold Coast Airport and Gold Coast Tourism, Queensland Tourism Minister Kate Jones has confirmed a January 2016 start for the service, according to The Gold Coast Bulletin .
"Hong Kong Airlines will operate its first Australian service in January 2016 marking the first direct route from Hong Kong to the Gold Coast with connections through to Cairns three times a week," Jones said.
“These seasonal services have been secured thanks to a partnership between Gold Coast Tourism, Gold Coast Airport, Cairns Airport and Tourism and Events Queensland.”
While Qantas and Cathay Pacific both fly from Brisbane to Hong Kong, this would be the first service from the Gold Coast.
The flights would run on Hong Kong Airlines' Airbus A330s fitted with both business and economy class cabins.
The airline also has 15 advanced Airbus A350 jets on order for delivery from 2018.
Follow Australian Business Traveller on Twitter: we're @AusBT
About David Flynn David Flynn is the editor of Australian Business Traveller and a bit of a travel tragic with a weakness for good coffee, shopping and lychee martinis.

Post a comment now! -2 report reply 1 1 hour, 13 minutes ago by StudiodeKadent Do you know if this will be the A330-300 (or -200V) or A330-200 plane?
The -300 (and -200V) has a larger business class cabin with fully flat beds and Sogerma Solstys-style seating. With lots of red Because China.
It would be interesting if HK Airlines tries to come more into the Australian market. Sure Cathay would probably be hostile but it would add some competition, and we know QF and Cathay don't exactly have a love-and-cuddles relationship despite both being Oneworld.
